name: Smash Quest
description:
Charge into the fight and smash your way through hordes of evil minions! Guide your heroes through each dungeon floor in pursuit of loot, experience and fame.

- Simple Controls - fling your heroes to smash your foes
- Strategy Matters - be tactical about how you use your chosen heroes
- Your Adventuring Party - not all heroes are born equal. Do you need a healer or a sneaky rogue for this fight?
- Hard to Master - only the best will make it far
- Forces of Evil - protect the world from all manner of monsters
